title: (x) AD&T bell phone center store / black swashy italic - various suggestions {Mike Y, Penn, Elzo}
content:
Hi everyone,

Please could someone ID this font? Presume it is hand drawn though.

All the best

RB

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [SKMBT\_C25208071516350.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014053/http:/typophile.com/files/SKMBT_C25208071516350.jpg) | 393.56 KB |
author: rtgbanks

comments.content:
I think it is a custom font, if not hand-drawn, as you suggest. At least, I do not know anything to match it. [Cooper Black Swash](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014053/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/wordshape/cooper-black-swash-italic/) is the closest I can think of in terms of feeling.

- Mike Yanega

A similar swashy type, but more modern is the wonderful Bello.  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/underware/bello\_pro\_ot/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100329014053/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/underware/bello_pro_ot/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/underware/bello\_pro\_ot/")
